Package bcu.cmp5332.librarysystem.commands

package bcu.cmp5332.librarysystem.commands
  • Class
    Description
    AddBook
    Adds a new book to the library.
    AddPatron
    Adds a new patron to the library.
    Borrow
    Adds a new patron to the library.
    It is an implementation of the Command interface and its execute method creates a loan object and attaches it to the given patron and book.
    It is created and executed by the CommandParser when the "borrow" command is given by the user.
    The class has a constructor to intialise the fields needed to execute the command.
    Command
     
    DeleteBook
    Deletes a book from the library.
    It is an implementation of the Command interface and its execute method deletes the given book from the system.
    It is created and executed by the CommandParser when the "deletebook" command is given by the user.
    The class has a constructor to intialise the fields needed to execute the command.
    DeletePatron
    Deletes a patron from the library.
    It is an implementation of the Command interface and its execute method deletes the given patron from the system.
    It is created and executed by the CommandParser when the "deletepatron" command is given by the user.
    The class has a constructor to intialise the fields needed to execute the command.
    Help
    It shows the help message.
    ListBooks
    Lists the books that are in the library.
    It is an implementation of the Command interface and its execute method list the books in the system.
    It is created and executed by the CommandParser when the "listbooks" command is given by the user.
    ListLoans
    Lists all the loans currently in the system.
    ListPatrons
    Shows a list of all patrons of the library to the user.
    LoadGUI
     
    PatronLoanHistory
    Lists all the terminated loans of a given patron.
    RenewBook
    Renews a loan for a specific amount of more days.
    It is an implementation of the Command interface and its execute method renews the given patron from the system.
    It is created and executed by the CommandParser when the "renew" command is given by the user.
    The class has a constructor to intialise the fields needed to execute the command.
    Return
    Returns a loan.
    ShowBook
    Shows the information of the book that has been entered by the user.
    ShowPatron
    Shows the information of the patron that has been entered by the user.
